name: Hidden Objects Secret Garden Passages Object Time
name_original: Hidden Objects Secret Garden Passages Object Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Secret Garden is a magnificently designed search and finder game with 30+ majestic Garden levels.

Gardens Around the World! Search through Rose Gardens, Japanese Gardens, Las Vegas Bellagio’s Botanical Gardens, English Gardens and more!

Find Secret Garden themed objects like Statues, Antique Trinkets, Roses, Hearts and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure is sure to entertain! “Detention Apps makes the Best Seek & Find Games!”

Hidden Objects – Secret Garden features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics reflecting beautiful Garden themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Drag Scene to Search


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
